articles.author: AlexBehunin
articles.title: Drew Dober Calls Out ‘Monster’ Jalin Turner And Turner Responds - MMA Mania
articles.description: Drew Dober had a name locked and loaded after his impressive knockout win last night (Sat., Dec. 17, 2022) at UFC Vegas 66 in Las Vegas, Nevada ... and it’s a very fun one.
